remarks: A class abstraction over a decidable proposition restricted to a singleton is either the empty set or the singleton itself.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 8-Aug-2018.)
statement:
rabrsndc.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
rabrsndc.2 $e |- DECID ph $.
rabrsndc $p |- ( M = { x e. { A } | ph } -> ( M = (/) \/ M = { A } ) ) $.
$d A x $.
